text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Is #Trump seriously taking credit for the job surge because people are finally heading back to work after the #COVID shutdown? Over 110,000+ Americans have died from #COVID19 

Then he mentions #GeorgeFloyd while the #Unemployment rate for #AfricanAmericans went up to 16.8%!
